name: Miracle Mia 2018 -Alpha
description:
When a mysterious woman in red tears open the universe, dark creatures known as Geos reemgerge after having been sealed away for hundreds of years to wreak havok on the world. Mia, a young tennis player, discovers she is the descendant of a magical society known as the Miracles whose lineage grants her the power to vanquish the evil. Armed with her racket and under the guide of her cat mentor, Mia fights to save the world and find her missing sister.

Miracle Mia is a cute, action-adventure platformer focusing on a volleying, tennis-like combat.

Featuring:
- volleying-tennis combat system
- vast variety of enemies
- 5 powerful Miracle Dresses with unique abilities
- climactic boss battles
- cats with headphones
-Xbox controller support

We hope for your support! Thanks for playing!
